security: Disclosing internal payment tracking methods could reveal operational details, though the memo itself lacks highly sensitive content.
summary: A memo and telegram regarding a payment to Edvard G. Tichborn, clarifying a delayed check issue and confirming deposit details after Tichborn inquired about the missing funds.
summary_one_paragraph: This document consists of a memorandum and a telegram concerning a payment discrepancy involving Edvard G. Tichborn (P). The memorandum, dated May 10, 1960, details Evalena S. Vidal's investigation into Tichborn's claim that he had not received a $650.00 check from Ashmead, Hanniferd & Associates. Vidal contacted Mr. Thomas Strange, Cover Division, who confirmed the check had been cleared by Tichbornâ€™s bank in California. Vidal then informed Tichborn, who indicated he would check with his bank. Accompanying this, a telegram from a person with the last name Lopez on May 5, 1960, to Henry Darkin requests a check on the missing payment.
title: Payment to Edvard G. Tichborn (P)
